Alois Alzheimer (1864-1915), German psychiatrist and neuropathologist

pinyin: Sheng4 ji1 ci2 he2 Ni2 wei2 si1

sentences.english: Limousin bulls stand at a cattle auction in Gross Kreutz, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 利木赞牛站在一个家畜拍卖上，大克罗伊茨，德国。
罗西茨基倾向他的头勇敢。

sentences.english: It is not proper to exaggerate influences of the former Soviet Union scholar Steherbastsky s writings in China.
sentences.chinese: 此外，郑文过分夸大了舍尔巴茨基著作在中国的影响。

sentences.english: FSV Mainz 05 but returned at the end of the season to Wolfsburg.
sentences.chinese: 美茵茨，但在返回本赛季结束后沃尔夫斯堡。

sentences.english: One of the theoretical bases of this estimation is the Environmental Kuznets Curve KEC.
sentences.chinese: 这一判断的理论基础之一是环境库兹涅茨曲线假设。

sentences.english: The tufts along the fuselage and wings perform a similar function.
sentences.chinese: 沿机身和机翼塔夫茨执行类似的功能。

sentences.english: The creation of such systems will begin after 2012.
sentences.chinese: 维索茨基说“此计划将于2012年之后开始实施。”

sentences.english: New species of Trapa and Najas from Jiangxi, China.
sentences.chinese: 江西菱属和茨藻属的新种。
两封信都寄自特罗伊茨。

sentences.english: NEAR THE VILLAGE of Pratzen Rostov had been told to look for Kutuzov and the Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯托夫奉命在普拉茨村附近寻找库图佐夫和国王。

sentences.english: If they succeed then Mr. Tsvangirai will be sworn into office.
sentences.chinese: 如果这轮谈判成功，那么茨万吉拉伊将宣誓就任总理。

sentences.english: When the bird said go right, spats wanted to go left.
sentences.chinese: 小鸟说向右走的时候，斯派茨却想向左走。

sentences.english: Taitz says Sankey's UK police expertise has been invaluable.
sentences.chinese: 泰特茨说桑基的英国警察的专业知识非常宝贵。

sentences.english: The Cihu Fault in the region is recently active, its feature of stick slip is clear.
sentences.chinese: 茨湖断层具有最新活动特征，粘滑标志明显。

sentences.english: Gorbach and Goldin at Tufts University.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔巴奇和戈尔丁在塔夫茨大学。

sentences.english: "There really aren't any limits, " says Twenge.
sentences.chinese: “其实这真的没有什么限制，”特温茨说。
